Content release datetime question



  • 2009-06-11 17:56:44

    Content release datetime question

    Hello. I have 1.6.2 installed and I was wondering if there was a way to...

    1.) Have content "close" at a specific date time. Like how you can set up the Tests and Surveys to only be available during a certain time.

    2.) Set up a recurring schedule where content becomes available three times per week (or something like that). Could CRON be involved?

    Thanks!


  • 2009-06-12 03:22:59

    Re: Content release date/time question

    hia,

    1. [content page] -> edit -> properties -> release date
    2. not available now


  • 2009-06-12 08:40:01

    Re: Content release date/time question

    Re#2 If you can program php, you could create a module to run with Cron. Have a look at the module developer documentation for details about creating a cron script.


  • 2009-06-12 10:58:18

    Re: Content release date/time question

    Vegard,

    I actually meant if there is a way to close it's availability at a certain time... not make it available.

    Any ideas on that one?

    Thanks.


  • 2009-06-12 15:10:13

    Re: Content release date/time question

    ah, sorry - my bad :) no idea on that one, other than closing the whole course, but that's probabaly not what you're after..
